00030 cam::cam(QoccHarnessWindow* window) {
00031         assert(window != 0);
00032 
00033         uiStuff *ui = new uiStuff(window);
00034         /* the rest of these inherit from uiStuff, where   **
00035         ** theWindow is declared static - they inherit it. */
00036         shapeInfo *shapeI = new shapeInfo();
00037         aSample *sample = new aSample();
00038         shapeOffset *shapeO = new shapeOffset();
00039         gcode2Model *gToM = new gcode2Model();
00040 }
